snippet.title: Red Crow Mysteries Legion - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
"My name is Legion; for we are many."
You are on the test! Afterlife spirits have chosen you to stand for the mankind when the time comes. Will you resist the temptations and outsmart the one who has many names?

more information on www.layernet.de
